title: ˝What is Twitter， a Social Network or a News Media？ ˝ hot on Twitter， May 2nd
content:
Mr. Haewoon Kwak (
Advanced Networking Lab
, Advisor: Prof. Sue Moon) posted "What is Twitter, a Social Network or a News Media? " on SlideShare last Sundy, May 2nd and it was tweeted more than any other document on SlideShare of that very day.
It was viewed more than 1,981 times  and downloaded 101 times (
May 4th 15:17PM)
.
To see the slides visit :
What is Twitter, a Social Network or a News Media? on SlideShare
